metadata.feature_description: Manage post authors, change authorship, and filter content by author

steps.expected: Publisher News page with posts is displayed
steps.actual: Publisher News page displayed with list of posts

steps.action: Click on a post to view details
steps.actual: Post detail page displayed with author information visible

steps.action: Click Edit Post to enter edit mode
steps.expected: Post edit mode with author panel should be accessible
steps.actual: Edit mode opened with Edit Post Details and Change Author panels visible in slide-out panel

steps.expected: Change Author panel shows current author and list of available users
steps.actual: Change Author panel shows 'Post Author: SuperUser Account' with sortable table headers (Name, Email, Joined) but empty user list due to module permission restrictions

issues: User list is empty because only users with module Edit permissions are shown as potential authors. With only SuperUser having permissions, no alternative authors are available to select.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Filter posts by author from sidebar

steps.action: Navigate to News page and locate Authors filter in sidebar
steps.expected: Authors filter section should be visible with list of authors and post counts
steps.actual: Authors section visible in sidebar showing 'SuperUser Account' with count '12'

steps.action: Click on SuperUser Account in the Authors filter
steps.expected: Posts should be filtered to show only posts by SuperUser Account
steps.actual: Posts filtered successfully. URL changed to '?author=1' and 'Viewing: SuperUser Account x' indicator appeared

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View author profile information on post

steps.action: Navigate to a post detail page
steps.expected: Post should display author information with avatar and name
steps.actual: Post detail page shows author avatar, 'Written by SuperUser Account' text, and 'More from this author' link

steps.expected: Should navigate to filtered view showing all posts by that author
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to /News?author=1 showing all posts by SuperUser Account with filter indicator

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Author sorting functionality in Change Author panel

steps.action: Open Change Author panel in post edit mode
steps.expected: Panel should show sortable columns: Name, Email, Joined
steps.actual: Change Author panel displays table with sortable column headers (Name, Email, Joined). Name column shows 'asc' class indicating default ascending sort by display name

steps.action: Verify sorting UI elements are present
steps.expected: Column headers should be clickable for sorting
steps.actual: Column headers have data-bind='click: sort' attribute and sortColumnClass binding confirming sorting functionality is implemented. Name column displays 'asc' class showing active ascending sort

issues: Unable to fully test sorting interaction as user list is empty (only SuperUser has module permissions). However, code inspection confirms sorting functionality is properly implemented with click handlers and sort state tracking.

steps.action: Check author display format in post list
steps.expected: Author name should be displayed consistently
steps.actual: Posts show 'Posted on [date] by SuperUser Account' format consistently

steps.action: Check author display format in post detail
steps.expected: Author section should show full name with avatar
steps.actual: Post detail shows author avatar image, 'Written by SuperUser Account' text, and 'More from this author' link

steps.action: Check author display in Change Author panel
steps.expected: Current author should be displayed with avatar and name
steps.actual: Panel header shows 'Post Author:' with avatar image and 'SuperUser Account' display name

observations: The Change Author panel shows an empty user list because the GetAuthors API only returns users with Edit permissions on the module. In this test environment, only SuperUser has these permissions.
The AuthorManager.GetAuthors method uses ModulePermissionController to determine eligible authors based on module permissions, which is the expected behavior for security.
Sorting functionality in the Change Author panel is implemented using Knockout.js data bindings (click: sort, sortColumnClass) and supports sorting by displayName, email, and joined date.
The Author Filter in the News sidebar supports pagination via the AuthorFilterManager which calls GetTopAuthors API endpoint.
Code review confirms SetPostAuthor API endpoint requires valid contentItemId and userId parameters with anti-forgery token validation for security.
